original_text: Then he made love to his wife again, and she became pregnant and gave birth to a son. He named him Beriah, because there had been misfortune in his family.
korean_text: 그리고 에브라임이 그의 아내와 동침하매 임신하여 아들을 낳으니 그 집이 재앙을 받았으므로 그의 이름을 브리아라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then he made love to his wife again
and gave birth to a son
because there had been misfortune in his family
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그의 가족에 불행이 있었기 때문이다
